name: Bloby and The Missing Link
description:
Bloby and The Missing Link is a short game  experience about, Bloby is a highly mutable being and has to collect DNA samples to reach his goal of finding the missing link in his evolutionary tree. 

Gameplay:

Collect DNA samples to chain abilities together (or any permutation) at any time.

Controls:
  • Left, Right / A, D: Move

When Available:

  • Spacebar: Jump/ Fly
  • 1 Key: activates "bipede" DNA (enables jump)
  • 2 Key: activates modifier for "bipede" DNA
  • 3 Key: activates Fly
  • 4Key: activates modifier for "wings" DNA
